experience.curdesc: Joined on 4th December of last year. Now I'm working here as PWA( Progressive Web Apps ) trainee cum developer. It is really a wonderful opportunity to leran a new approch towards Web-designing and developing.
experience.fdesc: I worked at mobly technologies as a Web developer. Focussed only on back-end technologies and content management systems like Magento, Wordpress, Opencart. Developed morethan 7 projects using content management systems.
experience.ldesc: I worked at BuenaSoft as a full-stack web developer, I had to work on both front-end as well as back-end technologies, for back-end i was using PHP with codeigniter framework Developed more than 12 projects there.

achievements.ach1: Completed Foundation program conducted by infosys at Raghu Engineering College-Visakhapatnam
achievements.ach2: Got 2<sup>nd</sup> Price for Web designing and development contest conducted by Millinium Software Solutions.
achievements.ach5: Participated Blogging & Ethical hacking Program Conducted by D3 Labs

Declaration.dec: I hereby certify that all the above information is correct to the best of my knowledge and belief.
